ThingsGateway.Foundation.Modbus.ModbusRe.AddressDes:
Coil registers are numbered starting from 00001.
Discrete input registers are numbered starting from 10001.
Input registers are numbered starting from 30001.
Holding registers are numbered starting from 40001.
Example: 40001=>Holding register first register
Additional format
Device station number, such as 40001;s=2;, indicates that the device address is the first register of the holding register with a device address of 2.
Write function code, such as 40001;w=16;, means that the first register of the holding register, when writing a value, uses the 0x10 function code
ThingsGateway.Foundation.Modbus.ModbusRe.FunctionNotSame: Function codes are inconsistent, request function code {0}, return function code {1}
ThingsGateway.Foundation.Modbus.ModbusRe.StationNotSame: Station numbers are inconsistent, request station number {0}, return station number {1}
